links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,500
prog: (PARI) v=[]; for(n=1,65,v=concat(v,floor(exp(n/Pi)))); v(PARI) { default(realprecision, 100); for (n=1, 500, write("b062121.txt", n, " ", floor(exp(n/Pi))) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 02 2009]
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jun 29 2001
extensions: OFFSET changed from 0,3 to 1,3 by _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 02 2009
